overview: A story of a mother, in village of Thar desert in border area, who sacrificed her motherhood for the justice to her country and for a soldier whom she also said to be her son. She did not even thought for a single minute for her only son who could get into difficulty.
tagline: After last night's duty on the Border, "Resignation" or "Suicide" were the only options left for that soldier.
title: Mother of Desert
